titles.title: Stockpiling Active Pharmaceutical Ingredients Act
Stockpiling Active Pharmaceutical Ingredients Act
To direct the Secretary of Defense to develop a plan to ensure an adequate supply of medications for the military health system.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Stockpiling Active Pharmaceutical Ingredients Act
This bill requires the Department of Defense to develop a plan for the military health system for stockpiling essential medications to ensure availability of a 180-day supply during armed conflict or other supply chain disruptions. The plan must mitigate vulnerabilities to active pharmaceutical ingredient supply chains and reduce dependence on active pharmaceutical ingredients from foreign sources.
